mergewith.subtemplate:
<distribution id="transmissionLikelihood.t:$(n)" spec="breath.distribution.TransmissionTreeLikelihood" colourOnly="false"> <tree idref="Tree.t:$(n)"/> <blockstart id="blockstart.t:$(n)" spec="parameter.RealParameter" value="0.5" lower="0" upper="1.0"/> <blockend id="blockend.t:$(n)" spec="parameter.RealParameter" value="0.5" lower="0" upper="1.0"/> <blockcount id="blockcount.t:$(n)" spec="parameter.IntegerParameter" value="0" lower="-1" upper="100000"/> <populationModel id="ConstantTransmissionPopulation.t:$(n)" spec="ConstantPopulation"> <popSize id="transmissionPopSize.t:$(n)" spec="parameter.RealParameter" lower="0.0" upper="Infinity">0.5</popSize> </populationModel> <endTime id="endTime.t:$(n)" spec="parameter.RealParameter" value="-1"/>
<origin id="transmissionOrigin.t:$(n)" spec="parameter.RealParameter" value="10000"/> <samplingHazard id="samplingHazard.t:$(n)" spec="breath.distribution.GammaHazardFunction" shape="10.0" rate="6.5" C="0.75"/> <transmissionHazard id="transmissionHazard.t:$(n)" spec="breath.distribution.GammaHazardFunction" shape="10.0" rate="8.5" C="2.0"/> </distribution>
<!-- transmission likelihood priors --> <prior id="BlockCountPrior.t:$(n)" x="@blockcount.t:$(n)"> <distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower="-1" upper="4"/> </prior> <prior id="BlockStartPrior.t:$(n)" x="@blockstart.t:$(n)"> <distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower="0" upper="1"/> </prior> <prior id="BlockEndPrior.t:$(n)" x="@blockend.t:$(n)"> <distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower="0" upper="1"/> </prior> <prior id="TransmissionPopSizePrior.t:$(n)" x="@transmissionPopSize.t:$(n)"> <distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower="0" upper="Infinity"/> </prior> <prior id="TransmissionOriginPrior.t:$(n)" x="@transmissionOrigin.t:$(n)"> <distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.Uniform" lower="0" upper="Infinity"/> </prior>
<!-- estimated transmission parameters --> <operator id="transmissionInfectionMover.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.InfectionMover" blockstart="@blockstart.t:$(n)" blockend="@blockend.t:$(n)" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" likelihood="@transmissionLikelihood.t:$(n)" weight="50.0"/>
<operator id="transmissionBlockOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.BlockOperator" blockstart="@blockstart.t:$(n)" blockend="@blockend.t:$(n)" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="50.0"/> <operator id="transmissionPopSizeScaler.t:$(n)" spec="kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" parameter="@transmissionPopSize.t:$(n)" scaleFactor="0.1" upper="10.0" weight="5.0"/>
<operator id="transmissionOriginScaler.t:$(n)" spec="kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" parameter="@transmissionOrigin.t:$(n)" scaleFactor="0.1" upper="10.0" weight="0.5"/>
<operator id="BREATHEpochTopWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="2.0"> <operator id="BREATHEpochTop.t:$(n)" spec="EpochFlexOperator" scaleFactor="0.1" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="2.0"/> </operator> <operator id="BREATHEpochAllWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="2.0"> <operator id="BREATHEpochAll.t:$(n)" spec="EpochFlexOperator" fromOldestTipOnly="false" scaleFactor="0.1" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="2.0"/> </operator> <operator id="BREATHTreeFlexWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="2.0"> <operator id="BREATHTreeFlex.t:$(n)" spec="TreeStretchOperator" scaleFactor="0.01" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="2.0"/> </operator> <operator id="BREATHTreeRootScalerWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="3.0"> <operator id="BREATHTreeRootScaler.t:$(n)" spec="kernel.BactrianScaleOperator" rootOnly="true" scaleFactor="0.1" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" upper="10.0" weight="3.0"/> </operator> <operator id="BREATHUniformWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="30.0"> <operator id="BREATHUniformOperator.t:$(n)" spec="kernel.BactrianNodeOperator" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="30.0"/> </operator> <operator id="BREATHSubtreeSlideWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="15.0"> <operator id="BREATHSubtreeSlide.t:$(n)" spec="kernel.BactrianSubtreeSlide" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="15.0"/> </operator> <operator id="BREATHNarrowWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="15.0"> <operator id="BREATHNarrow.t:$(n)" spec="Exchange" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="15.0"/> </operator> <operator id="BREATHWideWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="3.0"> <operator id="BREATHWide.t:$(n)" spec="Exchange" isNarrow="false" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="3.0"/> </operator> <operator id="BREATHWilsonBaldingWrapOperator.t:$(n)" spec="breath.operator.TreeWrapOperator" blockcount="@blockcount.t:$(n)" weight="3.0"> <operator id="BREATHWilsonBalding.t:$(n)" spec="WilsonBalding" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="3.0"/> </operator>
Epoch operator that only scale internal nodes above least recent node for tree t:$(n) Epoch operator that scales all internal nodes for tree t:$(n) Flex operators for all internal nodes for tree t:$(n) Scales root node for tree t:$(n) Draws new internal node heights uniformally for tree t:$(n) Performs subtree slide rearrangement of tree t:$(n) Narrow exchange performs local rearrangement of tree t:$(n) Wide exchange performs global rearrangement of tree t:$(n) Performs Wilson-Balding global rearrangement of tree t:$(n)
Transmission block count prior on tree t:$(n)
Transmission block start prior on tree t:$(n)
Transmission block end prior on tree t:$(n)
Transmission population size prior on tree t:$(n)
Transmission tree origin prior on tree t:$(n)
Moves infection of transmission tree t:$(n)
Updates block sizes of transmission tree t:$(n)
Scale population size of transmission tree t:$(n)
Scale origin of transmission tree t:$(n)
